DataElement.preferredDefinition: related to the initial process of identifying spread of cancer from the anatomic location where it first appeared to adjacent or in-transit structures._Limited to a particular location or area._the date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to the initial process of identifying spread of cancer from the anatomic location where it first appeared to adjacent or in-transit structures._Limited to a particular location or area.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Limited to a particular location or area.:The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor.

Concepts.definition: Of or belonging to a broader area or region of the body.

The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor.

Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: updated for ISO compliance. Released AN 7/8/15

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

DataElement.changeDescription: updated for ISO compliance. Released AN 7/8/15
